# B3Hub Monorepo - Copilot Instructions

This is a monorepo containing:
- **Backend**: NestJS (apps/backend)
- **Web**: Next.js (apps/web)
- **Mobile**: Expo (apps/mobile)

## Project Structure
- Uses npm workspaces for package management
- TypeScript across all projects
- Shared packages in packages/ directory

## Development Commands
- `npm install` - Install all dependencies
- `npm run dev:backend` - Run NestJS backend
- `npm run dev:web` - Run Next.js web app
- `npm run dev:mobile` - Run Expo mobile app

## Code Style
- Use TypeScript for all code
- Follow ESLint and Prettier configurations
- Maintain consistent naming conventions across projects
